title: SEE US HARVESTING BOUNTIFUL CHERRY TOMATOES IN A VERTICAL TOWER #FarmingRedefined #verticalplanters

tasks.task: Harvesting aeroponic orange cherry tomatoes from a tower garden.
subtasks: Grasp tomatoes carefully to avoid damaging the plant.
Twist or gently pull tomatoes off the vine.
Place harvested tomatoes in a container.
Rinse harvested tomatoes under water if necessary.
Inspect harvest for any damages or diseases.
Place damaged tomatoes in separate container (if needed).
Repeat harvesting process on adjacent plants.
Understand how plants are grown without soil.
Explain the use of water and mineral nutrient solution.
Identify the role of ionic minerals and trace elements in plant growth.
Observe the color of the tomatoes to gauge ripeness (Though this may already be done during harvesting).
